data.eml:eml: On the Tityus stigmurus complex (Scorpiones, Buthidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article De, Claudio Augusto R., Candido, Denise M., Lucas, Sylvia Marlene, Brescovit, Antonio Domingos (2009): On the Tityus stigmurus complex (Scorpiones, Buthidae). Zootaxa 1987: 1-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.185451
